name: Super Miami Beach Shark Drifter
description:
My Global Game Jam 2017 entry. A simple game where you are a shark, you knock down people and avoid cops. Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

After 10 points there's a cop after you and every 10 points from there add another cop. There's 5 cops total.

The game can be played on browsr here: https://paavonelimarkka.github.io/super-miami-beach-shark-drifter/smbsh_webgl/

The game is also opensource and can be found from here: https://github.com/paavonelimarkka/super-miami-bea...
